data.prayer: Father, help your children in Misiones, Argentina find someone like the Samaritan Woman today. Someone who will open an entire town to your message of salvation.
data.verse: So the woman left her water jar and went away into town and said to the people, 29 “Come, see a man who told me all that I ever did. Can this be the Christ?” They went out of the town and were coming to him.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Misiones, Argentina

data.prayer: Jesus, remind the disciples in the state of Misiones to train each other to obey all that you commanded, and that you will be with them as they do it.
data.verse: and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age."

data.prayer: Father, please raise up new apostles to pioneer the growth of the church in Misiones.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Spirit, help every believer in Misiones, Argentina be prepared to give an answer to everyone who asks them for the reason for their hope.
data.verse: But in your hearts revere Christ as Lord. Always be prepared to give an answer to everyone who asks you to give the reason for the hope that you have. But do this with gentleness and respect.

data.prayer: Lord, I thank you that you will bring health and a cure to the Turk people. Reveal to them abundance of peace and truth.
Father, encourage your church in Misiones that you never forsake them.
data.verse: Those who know your name will put their trust in you, for you, Yahweh, have not forsaken those who seek you.

data.prayer: Over 6.89 percent of the people of Misiones are far from Jesus.

data.section_summary:
the state of Misiones, Argentina has a population of 965,500.

We estimate Misiones has 106,717 people who might know Jesus, 792,248 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 66,536 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 9 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Lord, please provide elders whose hearts are completely yours in every town in the state of Misiones.
data.verse: The reason I left you in Crete was that you might put in order what was left unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.
